recipe.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipe.description: Sizzling Mexican chicken with peppers and warm tortillas

steps.descr: Mix cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper
steps.instructions: Mix cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Right, let's mix the cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper together. This will be the lovely spice mix for our chicken.
Now, let's toss the sliced chicken in that beautiful spice mix. Make sure every piece is nicely coated.

steps.descr: Heat pan, cook chicken until golden
steps.instructions: Heat pan, cook chicken until golden

on_enter.say: Let's get the pan nice and hot. We're going to cook the chicken until it's golden and sizzling. You'll know it's ready by that fantastic aroma.

steps.descr: Add peppers and onions, cook until soft
steps.instructions: Add peppers and onions, cook until soft

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the sliced peppers and onions to the pan. Cook them until they're soft and full of flavour.

steps.descr: Warm tortillas in a dry pan
steps.instructions: Warm tortillas in a dry pan

on_enter.say: Let's warm the tortillas in a dry pan. Just a minute or two on each side until they're soft and pliable.

steps.descr: Serve chicken and veg with tortillas and toppings
steps.instructions: Serve chicken and veg with tortillas and toppings

on_enter.say: Time to serve! Pile the chicken and veggies onto the tortillas and add your favourite toppings. It's going to be delicious!
Finally, let's squeeze some fresh lime over everything for that extra zing. Enjoy your meal!

notes.text:
High heat gives the best char
Serve on a sizzling hot plate for drama
Set up a fajita bar for interactive dining
